ticket.title: Can't freeze Rails because http://dev.rubyonrails.org/archives/ seems to be down
ticket.original-body:
Hi,
I can't freeze Rails because http://dev.rubyonrails.org/archives/ seems to be down.
@@@ >rake rails:freeze:edge RELEASE=2.3.4 (in /Users/camille/Development/Ruby/wemusic) cd vendor Downloading Rails from http://dev.rubyonrails.org/archives/rails_2.3.4.zip rake aborted! Operation timed out - connect(2)
(See full trace by running task with --trace) @@@
Thanks

version.body: The dev.rubyonrails.org domain is down. Possibly related: https://twitter.com/#!/dhh/status/61050725928681473 :-)
